sentences.en: Dark Templar: I am sure the Matriarch will be eager to hear your tale as well.
sentences.cn: 黑暗圣堂武士: 相信女酋长也会对你的故事感兴趣的.

sentences.en: In some cases it may include one of the matriarch's sisters and her offspring as well.
sentences.cn: 有些情况下,有可能包括母象首领的同胞姐妹和她的子女.

sentences.en: It is now the matriarch of a veritable family of Mars spacecraft.
sentences.cn: 另外,火星漫游号已绕轨一年多,它会测量地下含水量并拍摄红外线影像.

sentences.en: It is this male - leaving behavior that highlights the matriarch elephant family.
sentences.cn: 这种“走婚”行为形成了母系族大象家族的特点.

sentences.en: Robyn Erbesfield is a matriarch of modern sport climbing.
sentences.cn: RobynErbesfield是一位现代攀登运动的女族长.

sentences.en: The Matriarch was among the vendors that received a welcome compensation cheque.
sentences.cn: 我母亲也是获得可观赔偿金支票的卖家之一.

sentences.en: The most severe punishment a matriarch can dispense is exile from the house.
sentences.cn: 女族长所能判处的最重刑罚是流放.

sentences.en: When the bull elephant desires sexual activity , he approaches the matriarch - led herd.
sentences.cn: 当公象发情时, 接近母象群.

sentences.en: When the matriarch dies, one of the oldest offspring takes her place.
sentences.cn: 当领头的母象死后, 由另一头最年长的后代母象取而代之.

words.tran_cn: 女家长制社会；母权制时代；母系社会
母权制；女家长制；女族长制；母系氏族

trans.tran_en: a woman, especially an older woman, who controls a family or a social group
